title: MD
biography: Rita Levi-Montalcini was an Italian neurobiologist. She was awarded the 1986 Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine jointly with colleague Stanley Cohen for the discovery of nerve growth factor (NGF).
aiSummary: Rita Levi-Montalcini is a neurobiology specialist with an H-index of 60 at Sapienza University of Rome (Member). Has been published in Science (New York, N.Y.), Trends in Neurosciences, Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences. Based in Unknown, Unknown, Global.
knowsAbout: Nobel Prize in Physiology or Medicine
